Xu Gu




About

My name is Xu Gu(顾旭). I am a PhD Candidate at AIMind, Gaoling School of Artificial Intelligence(GSAI), Renmin University of China(RUC), advised by Prof. Ruihua Song.
My research interests are Vision-and-Language and Multimodal video understanding.
